database-object.create: CREATE TRIGGER t_iu_gen_prop ON gen_prop AFTER INSERT, UPDATE AS SET NOCOUNT ON; UPDATE gen_prop SET LastModified = CAST(ISNULL(CAST(ins.LastModified AS bigint), 0) + 1 AS binary(8)) FROM gen_prop AS gp INNER JOIN inserted ins ON ins.Id = gp.Id
database-object.drop: IF EXISTS(SELECT name FROM sysobjects WHERE name = 't_iu_gen_prop' AND type = 'TR') DROP TRIGGER t_iu_gen_prop
